goal_descEN: Ensure sustainable consumption and production patterns
target_descEN: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources
indicator_descEN: Material footprint, material footprint per capita, and material footprint per GDP
seriesDescription: Material footprint per unit of GDP, by type of raw material (kilograms per constant 2010 United States dollar)
sources: Environment Live / Global Material Flows Database
